H0.text: A metric ruler is the instrument best suited for measuring the volume of a pebble.

H1.text: A stopwatch is the instrument best for measuring the volume of a pebble.

H2.text: A triple beam balance is the best instrument for measuring the volume of a pebble.

H3.text: Graduated cylinder is the instrument best suited for measuring the volume of a pebble.

A4.text: Graduated cylinders are sometimes used to measure the volume of a solid indirectly by measuring the displacement of a liquid.
